name: id
description: The ID of the back link.

name: text
description: Text to use within the back link component. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored. Defaults to `"Back"`.

name: html
description: HTML to use within the back link component. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored. Defaults to `"Back"`.

name: href
description: The value of the link href attribute.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the container.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the tag.

name: visuallyHiddenText
description: An optional visually hidden prefix used before the back link text, for example `"Back to"` used by the breadcrumbs component.

name: element
description: HTML element for the back link component â€“ `"button"` or `"a"`. If not provided, defaults to `"a"`.
